form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: U.S. Department of Justice Immigration and Naturalization Service, A28 766 4

full_text: Screened by NARA, 6/1/2023 SAMPLE U.S. Depart it of Justice Immigration and Naturalization Service District Director 300 North Los Angeles Street JAN 26 1988 Los Angeles, CA. 90012 Carlos Alberto ROCHA FILE NO: A28 766 477 2107 S. Norwood St. Also Includes: Los Angeles, Calif. 90007 SILVA DE ROCHA, Andrea Pastora A28 766 478 Dear Mr. Rocha: This refers to your Request for Asylum in the United States. I have concluded, upon consultation with the Bureau of Human Rights and Humanitarian Affairs, Department of State, that you have established a well- founded fear of persecution upon return to your homeland. Therefore, in accordance with section 208 (a) of the Immigration and Nationality Act, your Request for Asylum in the United States is granted as of January 26, 1988 . Your asylum status may be terminated if it is subsequently determined you are no longer a refugee within the meaning of section 101 (a) (42) (A) of the Immi- gration and Nationality Act, or that you pose a danger to the community or to the security of the United States. You are authorized to remain in the United States until January 26, 1989 , at which time you must arrange to be interviewed to determine your continuing eligibility for asylum. Employment is authorized during this period. If you plan to depart the United States, it will be necessary for you to obtain prior permission to return. You may apply for permanent residence under section 209(b) of the Immigration and Nationality Act upon being physically present in the United States for at least one year after asylum was granted. Please keep this office informed of any change in your address. Sincerely, j hereby certify that I have compared this copy with its original and it is a true and complete copy thereof. Dated 4-14-89 Ernest E. Gustafson District Director L. A. C. B. immigration Legal Joyes Attomey-at-Law Assistance Project 300 N. Los Angeles Street Room 4349 no Anant California 90012
